name: infxrcld

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr), wss(c0, cxr))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cxr))

comment: The infimum of an arbitrary set of extended reals is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
